alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sherman County through 915 PM MDT... At 844 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goodland, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goodland around 900 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 11 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to ponding of water on area roads, including Interstate 70. Slow down and exercise additional caution to avoid hydroplaning.
